snippet: Officer Brian J. Groves was shot at close range while chasing a man in a stairwell, and he was most likely saved from a grievous injury by his bullet-resistant vest, the police said.
abstract: New York Police Commissioner Raymond W Kelly says that Officer Brian J Groves, who was shot at close range while chasing a man in a stairwell, was most likely saved by his bullet-resistant vest.
lead_paragraph: Officer Brian J. Groves was shot at close range while chasing a man in a stairwell, and he was most likely saved from a grievous injury by his bullet-resistant vest, the police said.

headline.seo: Officer Shot in Lower East Side Building
headline.main: Bullet Aimed at an Officer’s Heart Is Stopped by His Protective Vest
headline.print_headline: Bullet Aimed at an Officer’s Heart Is Stopped by His Protective Vest
